title: The Manliest Brony in the World
Black alleys of Canterlot
description:
I've really wanted to create a detective-ish tune for some time, and this is the outcome. 
 I actually planned to have my own voice in this one, i would tell the audience a story while the song played in the background. But, the mic i was planning to use wasn't good enough, so i decided to just do the song instead. 
I also planned on having samples in it, but it was pretty hard to find any that actually fit with the story i wanted to tell.

The style was inspired by Weird Bananas, go check out his really great stuff: https://8bc.org/members/Weird+Bananas/

title: Welcome to Ponyville
description:
A happy, upbeat "Pop" song, pretty similar to my Pinkie responsibility Pie or my Hopeful village.
As the name implies, i wanted this song to fit Ponyville; i wanted it to feel like you were there, like you were just taking a stroll through the town, greeting all the ponies, taking a look at the shops etc.
Tried to make it feel a bit like a video game tune aswell, specifically a RPG game. This could fit rather well in a Pony RPG, as the Ponyville theme, no? (Obviously it would be loopable in that case)

title: MC Flowny - Dog Diamonds (Over Animus Vox)
description:
This is my take on the Diamond Dogs over the Glitch Mob's 'Animus Vox'

In regards to 'Animus Vox': So I took the short intro, used the "rappy" part which went right into the "choral" part, added ANOTHER "rappy" part, and then added the ending. That makes sense, right?

Lyrics: 
Beneath the earth under the dirt / below the subterranean passages
past the masses of the black facets / It is the land hid in the back
Beyond the track, deep into the depths of the darkest of all paths. 

We are a race of ravenous wrath beings.
Some fast feeding, furious mad heaving get that ass beaten.. 
And that's meaning you passed the first meeting, and by pass
I mean you last - the rip & thrash greeting. 

Our calling cards are shards of gems - bound around our necks. 
Embedded in leather, a sign of respect.
And the better and more precious a gem is.
The more venomous and more likely to wreck - that veteran is. 

And we are pack minded. Meaning Omegas straight attack 
While the Alphas plan ahead designing trap mines.
These fine devices devised by wry bastards. 
And you will find in these Mine Shafts - divine Masters 

We the diamond dogs, our dog diamonds
glimmer underneath the dim of Earth and keep shining.
So keep an eye on your rocks, or you'll get rocked on. 
These dogs are off of the leash, and you'll get dogged on. 

Who let the dogs out?
Who let the dogs out?
Who let the dogs out?
We let the dogs out! 

Better climb if you find yourself lost here. 
We the canines that dine upon your heart's fear. 

I won't stop you, becoming self independent. 
If you want to venture into the pit, then go ahead and 
Don't blame me if you fall off a cliff or get beheaded. 
Cause you Dance with the Dogs - admit - your life has ended. 

Been in the clutches of the dogs before. 
I've seen their fury underground like they gods of war. 
Soulless beasts who can gorge and feast upon the living. 
Cerberus has a far better chance to be forgiving
Now, there is another who survived this feat.. 
An urban legend of girl who connived and schemed.
Instead of pleading for her life, she decides to treat 
them to a mind trick, and in the end defies their greed.

A rare breed of a beautiful sly manipulator. 
And confined as a prisoner, doesn't try to escape
Buys time with confusion, until her friends can save her 
When in fact, it's the dogs whose dying to separate her. 

//CHORUS//

It's a rare case, so - let it marinate. 
Go tell your pony friends - that this Mare's great. 
Go share that Diamond Dogs got all their nerves grated. 
And that one pony was more than they anticipated.

And that within one day she was the most hated. 
And that this chance occurence was truly ill fated.
And that a pony's whining is simply understated. 
A Rarity indeed - it cannot be debated. 

References: 
http://fc09.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2011/309/7/a/diamond_dogs_are_gonna_getcha_...
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=17PM-UMVud8
http://el-grimlock.deviantart.com/art/Werewolf-Warrior-255138248

Fluttershy the kind pegasus is alone in the woods at first shes happy and smiling (beginning)

(louder harp as it gos on for 2 messures) Fluttershy is calming down but as she looks around she knows anything could happen her fears come back (loud music comes back) she then remembers how her friends would always tell her she is strong and can do anything (the hard music stops it gets soft) its just like the beginning she is happy and nothing can stop her

title: Beautiful Night
description:
Instrumental Version: http://www.mediafire.com/?bin4a2ihw0p8bd5
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/navy-brony
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Navy-Brony/246536198762996

Inspiration for the song?

Ever since I got into music with the brony community, I always had a draw to the short Meteor Shower scene from Owls Well That Ends Well, and wanted to do a song about it. Well, after many months and multiple failed attempts later, I finally have something that closely resembles what I originally had in mind.

Genre: Electronic/Industrial

title: The Equestral Plane
description:
Soundcloud: http://soundcloud.com/navy-brony
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pages/Navy-Brony/246536198762996

Background image used with permission, by John Joseco: http://johnjoseco.deviantart.com/art/Crazy-Pie-and-Angry-Shy-209810495

A little background on the song (considering there's no lyrical content):

The story's about a man who dreamt of going to Equestria, and through discovering the wonders of Astral Projection, decides to try and project himself into the world. However things are not as he imagined, and he quickly discovers himself locked in a never ending nightmare, his only wish to return home from where he came, but was he in Equestria to begin with?

I end up thinking some interesting stories when making music.

Genre: ? Probably a mutated baby from the mating of psytrance and industrial.

title: Rise and Fall of Emperor Discord
description:
This is a new song added to the recently updated Smile! charity album. You can get 63 exclusive songs (including two others from me) by donating here http://broniesforgood.org/seeds-of-kindness/instructions/

Free Download of this Song and Other Works Here:
http://sdoggingsworth.bandcamp.com

This particular track tells the story of Discord's reign, his attempt to seduce Luna to the darkside, her rejection of him, and his ultimate defeat by Celestia and Luna - wielders of the Elements of Harmony. It is eventually going to be integrated into a concept album I'm working on about the History of Equestria from Luna's point of view ("A Little Night Music").

The Rise and Fall of Emperor Discord Copyright 2012 Sprocket

Art is a cropped version of "Palace Discord" by Jamie Swiftrunner, Commissioned by TiQ. View the full piece here: http://jamieswiftrunner.deviantart.com/#/d49wiqj

My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic was created by Lauren Faust for Hasbro, Inc, and the Hub. They own the rights to the character Discord.

title: Major Battle (March 2012 WRO)
description:
Evdog’s Winter Rap Off entry, Twilight meets an Ursa Major. K, in the

Red corner, we got an Ursa Major.
This ain’t some minor problem. This beast’d scare the roofs and the
Hooves of the homes and the ponies in the area.
He’d scare you if you were there, ‘cause, y’know, he’s a bear. An’ in the

Purple corner, a sparkle of hope.
Twilight’s taking him on with …a floating piece of rope?
No, wait! Trixie. She’s come back. Redemption Fanfic? Maybe.
Since Nopony’s been acting themselves lately.

With a flash of light they try to restrain the might of the
Ursa, but he put up a fight and they can’t contain him.
He takes a swipe at the two girls, misses, then hurls a
Giant rock in the direction of the cake shop.

Come on, man. We need that more than you think.
See, we can’t live without the Cakes and Pinkie.
We’ll, we can… but things’d just be very boring.
…Moving on.

It seems the duo can do naught to fraught
 the stranger bringing danger to ponies everywhere
The bear edges closer, with a menacing growl
We really could use a Deus ex Machina right now.

An’ then Luna rocks up, an’ she kicks up a storm. She’s like
“What ‘chu doin’ in Ponyville”, but in a more proper form.
The Major meets his maker and he’s like “see ya later”, and
Makes a break for his cave while everypony raves on about Luna. 
No longer feared but revered, the night mare steals the spotlight.
One wonders why didn’t she come sooner?

title: [B.B.B.F.F.]Big Brother Best Friend Forever (Trance Remix)
description:
Okay so I tried working backwards in comparison to what I normally do. Normally when I want to remix a song, I work around the acapella, but instead I decided to make the song first (well part of it), then have the acapella work around it. I must say, this worked out a thousand times better, less stress, and finished faster. Although I missed the good ol times of finding out what to do.

Anyway, I hope you guys like this. This is so far my favorite remix that I've done so far and I'm starting to better familiarize myself with Fruity Loops Studio. Hope you enjoy this.

Also, thanks to generalzoi for the pony maker. Probably should've made my cutie mark a music note or general dj gear cause I'm not exactly a turntablist but meh, I'll go with it. Rest is just 2 hours of photoshop magic.

Finished an AMV of it: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wk3Km9viDsg

title: The Darkening (Original Mix)
description:
READ THE STORY: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/art/Part-One-The-Darkening-309086346

MP3 320 kbps download: http://www.mediafire.com/?23ct05w1m9cfl9w

Buy the EP on Bandcamp: http://thorinair.bandcamp.com/album/the-darkening-the-redemption

My next goal is to buy studio monitor speakers, to help with my production. Feeling generous? You can help by donating! http://dl.dropbox.com/u/1739027/Donate/donate.html

YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/user/Thorinair 
SoundCloud: http://soundcloud.com/thorinair
Visit my Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Thorinair-Music/181104641974397
Visit my deviantART page: http://thorinair.deviantart.com/
Follow me on Tumblr: http://thorinair-music.tumblr.com/
PonySquare: http://ponysquare.com/Thorinair/
Twitter: http://twitter.com/thorinair_music

Listen to The Redemption here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UixIyB84uZ4


It has been a while, hasn't it...? So much university work to do and no time...

This is the first track of my two-track EP "The Darkening / The Redemption", both tracks telling the story of a second Changeling attack on Canterlot and the desparate attempts of refugee ponies to save it.

I am sorry that this one took over a month of production time, but I really wanted to make it as good as possible and polish it.

The track is dark, sad and progressive, yet with the hints of uplifting... Maybe a hope? We shall see...

Hope you like it!

Keep tuned in for the part two in the following months, "The Redemption"!


Track mastered by HMage: http://www.youtube.com/user/HMageD

The amazing picture used in artwork was made by Raikoh-illust ( http://raikoh-illust.deviantart.com/ ). You should definitely go check out his work!

title: For the New Lunar Republic (Charity Cover)
description:
Art by Huussii:
http://huussii.deviantart.com/art/MLP-The-Lunar-Rebellion-257547843

Donate:
http://thecarbonmaestro.bandcamp.com/track/maestro-fixes-nacp-for-the-new-lunar-republic-charity-cover


So I lost a bet on TF2 with another brony musician. The loser has to cover something that the winner chooses. Knowing that I like Celestia more than Luna, he chose "For The New Lunar Republic" by NACP. This had to be finished within 24 hours. Well what do you know, 12 hours later, 8 hours of sleep, and a 30 minute final, I still managed to whip out this song. I not going to lose as a pyro against a spy again. Not by 20 points. 

The cover's in my usual style, and luckily the song is so easy to cover I can create my own midis in about 30 minutes, and finish the song in 3 hours. Much shorter than the days that it usually takes when I compose from scratch. 

Since I can't contact NACP, I have decided to donate 100% of the proceeds of this cover to the Seeds of Kindness.

title: Matthew N + Freewave - Exploring for Answers (ft. John De Lancie)
description: When I first heard the EQD interview with John De Lancie it was fascinating and it was interesting hearing about how we looked like as a movement from an outsider (although we all go through an initial period when discovering the community on being a bit confused by it ourselves). Hopefully this is a track that tells us a little bit about ourselves, and who we are, or at least makes you think about it what many of those reasons could be. Hopefully a track you could play for a Trekkie or a parent and they might understand us better or be interested. Glad our track came together as it did and I hope you enjoy it. title: "Leave Me Alone" - Evdog & Meelz
description:
Being the Lord of Chaos must get pretty lonely sometimes...
Stems Available here: https://www.dropbox.com/s/c7tmyto2d8evnjv/stems%20320.zip 

This was entered into Toastbeard, round ER310, and tied for 1st.
Evdog - Arrangement, Vocals
Meelz - Production, Guitar

LYRICS
VERSE 1:
You always trying to assert yourself over me
Always holding me back from becoming who I want to be
You don't seem to understand that I'm the one who runs this show. Oh no.
Well, it's time for you to understand and learn your place or you can pack up your things and go

CHORUS 1:
Just Leave me alone. Get out of my head, get out of my life
But don't go too long. I didn't mean it, I need somebody
I can't stand being alone.

VERSE 2:
Oh, why did it take me forever to realize I was wrong
Don't you know that in each other's arms is where both belong.
I want you. I need you. I don't know how I'd live without you. It's true
Please come back. I'm sorry. I mean it this time. I know we can both pull through.

CHORUS 1 x2, THEN GUITAR SOLO

BRIDGE:
And I can't understand why you're forcing my hand.
Why I hate you and love you on your demand.
Or maybe it's me. I wanna be free.
Look inside my eyes, I'm pleading: Please help me.

CHORUS 2:
Don't leave me alone. Stay by my side. Please hold on tight.
Until the break of dawn. But it won't last forever. ever. ever. ever. ever, yeah!

CHORUS 1 x2, THEN OVERLAPPED LYRIC SECTION

title: My Equestria [acoustic/vocal ballad]
description:
(from "Isle of Inisfree" – by Richard Farrelly, ©1950)
Vocals & Equestria lyrics by Dreamsong
Flute and instrumentation by Dreamsong

For some reason, for the last little while... I've been feeling... "Homesick"... ...for Equestria.

I can't really explain it... but that doesn't make the feelings any less real.

So, when I heard "Isle of Inisfree," a Celtic song about a displaced soul longing for their home... I knew just had to rewrite it to match how I was feeling.

If you've ever felt this too... I hope this song makes the longing a little easier knowing that there are others who feel it as well.


------------------------

I've met some folks who say that I'm a dreamer,
And I've no doubt there's truth in what they say,
But sure a body's bound to be a dreamer,
When all the things she loves are far away.
And precious things are dreams unto an exile.
They bring her home to a land so magical
And in her heart she's once again pony,
In her dear lovely home, Equestria.

When this world's moon rises beyond the rooftops,
Of this great city, with wonders near and far,
I scarcely feel the bright lights or the turmoil...
I'm home again in my Equestria.

I wander o'er green hills through dreamy valleys,
And find a peace no other land would know.
I hear the birds make music fit for angels,
And watch the rivers laughing as they flow.
And back to Ponyville my hooves they take me,
My dear old home and tenderly behold,
Ponies I love around the village, gathered.
And I relive their friendships young and old.

But dreams don't last
Though friends are not forgotten
And soon I'm back to harsh reality.
But even if they paved the roads with gold here,
I still would choose my dear Equestria.

description:
LYRICS

I always wanted my own brother,
and then he showed up at our door.
I didn't question where he came from;
I wasn't lonely anymore!

Soon we did everything together;
he taught me how to fly a kite!
I watched him grow into a stallion,
I watched him sleep in bed at night; it's not creepy!

[Chorus]
I gave you my heart and then you turned around...
The secrets that we shared, the moments that you cared...

We went streaking in the park, skinny dipping after dark...

I gave you my heart and then you turned around...
Depressing melodies, suppressing fantasies...
I gave you my heart and then you turned around...

But then he signed that record label;
a cute quintet of boyish sound!
But now that everybody loves him,
I'm just a face out in the crowd!

I threw myself into my studies
to have the world in my control.
I vaporized the competition;
nobody understands me; it's not evil!

Just take it from me, I know you'll come around!
Though the law forbids it, this is kismet!
Say "I do" and seal our souls together!
Voulez-vous, our love will last forever!
Since we're not related, it'll be ok...

I gave you my heart and then you turned around...
The secrets that we shared, the moments that you cared...

title: A Symphonic Metal Tribute to A Canterlot Wedding
description:
To celebrate the beginning of Season 3 of My Little Pony, The L-Train proudly presents: A Symphonic Metal Tribute to "A Canterlot Wedding!" This is my homage to the wonderful music from MLP's most ambitious episode yet, the Season 2 finale.

So a while ago I recorded a Symphonic Metal Tribute to My Little Pony ... some of you may have heard it :) But I only included the songs from Season 1, and lots of you have been asking "when is Season 2?" And I started working through the season 2 songs, sorting out what would work and what songs could go together ... and once I tallied up that songs on the "must include" list I had about 25 minutes worth of music! So I've concentrated on what I though was the best part of the season, musically, which was all the wonderful music from the finale. Enjoy!

All guitars, bass, drum programming and orchestral programming / arrangements by me (The L-Train). All music written by Daniel Ingram and William Anderson. My Little Pony is owned by Hasbro.

title: Cadence's Theme
description:
Also known as "Twilight and Cadence" or "Sunshine and Ladybugs".

This is sort of an outtake from A Symphonic Metal Tribute to A Canterlot Wedding; I was originally going to include this piece there, but I couldn't fit it in and still have the whole thing flow properly ... but it's a wonderful bit of music so I've extended it slightly and recorded it for you all! Enjoy!

All guitars, bass, drum programming and orchestral programming / arrangements by me (The L-Train). Music by William Anderson (mostly!). My Little Pony is owned by Hasbro.

title: Just Live Featuring Orion Melody
description:
Download https://eqbeats.org/track/4945/mp3

Lyrics https://docs.google.com/document/d/1xWYsIJvKE42j5GNNUHNOYM5hhO7Q84oR2y-rj0vbncc/edit

Orion Melody's Channel http://www.youtube.com/user/aWolfNamedOrion

Art work done by Kaca DragonFly for my birthday! FOLLOW HER TUMBLR NOW! http://askdragonfly.tumblr.com/ DO IT!


Honestly i feel like thsi should be a sub special

Backstory of the song
This song is actually a few things. The first verse is actually about brony rappers that look down at what they do. It was me saying that no matter what it's about if you have the skill you have the skill. It's that simple. What you're doing maybe different or wierd but that just means it's unique!
The second verse and third verse's were both directed at me on the other hand. The second being about the performance i have coming up and how i'm actually nervous due to the content of what i'm performing. The third verse is asking myself what i'm gonna do about it. ending the verse by saying i'm going to live. 

This is the song that is planned to end my set for my performance on the 27th so i felt the last verse i should try and get the audience involved as well! This is one of my favorite songs i've done amazing for fans of MLP and non!

To my fans (Or haters) thank you! You all made every verse i've ever rapped worth it! To my friends, you helped make this a AMAZING roller coaster that i had the chance to hop on. All the ups and downs that it's put us through, they were fun and we can look back at them and laugh! So where it takes me  or any of us may still be a mystery but i have a feeling that we're all gonna enjoy it. 

Finally to Orion! You and me HAVE to do another collab in the future! You're fucking amazing and without you this song wouldn't be NEAR as good as it is right now!

Follow me at Twitter https://twitter.com/Versal17

Tumblr http://versal-chronic.tumblr.com/

title: Smile Song - Fingerstyle Acoustic Guitar Cover
description:
I don't know about you all out there, but I had a very difficult summer.  Money troubles, injuries, disappointments, but worst of all: losing a loved one.

Throughout life's unusual course we face unwelcome surprises, but that does not mean we should just fold up and never be happy again!  Quite the contrary.  Smiling, laughing and acting like a big goof can brighten your mood and may even help others through their dark time.

So, again, show your friends and family some attention!  Heck, show yourself some attention.  It can help pick you out of the pits and keep you from the morass of modern life.

Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?eno6to914vn87i5

Sheet Music/Tablature: http://www.mediafire.com/view/wyz762h65kfurg8/Smile.pdf

Remember kids: Daniel Ingram and Amy Keating Rogers wrote this piece and all copyright resides with them, their publishing company, Hasbro, or something like that. Who knows with corporations. All mistakes are my own!

Someone with a better guitar and a stronger thumb should be recording these; there's too much buzz when I play.

In Resurrected Mix, I recreate Hypersonic with my newly acquired knowledge and techniques, bringing you a complete overhaul of the whole song: new instrumentation, different transitions, more intensity, different BPM, yet staying true to the original composition and ideas.

title: Luna Republik
description:
"Luna Republik" was written for a correspondent role play that is dictated by corruption, suffering, civil war and omnipresent fear. The piece of music has four parts, while the ending just refers to the beginning. First the string section starts off with melancholic harmonies, then a lonely flute plays a melody that reflects all the suffering caused by corruption and war. The first part permanently rises to a beseeching exclaimation, just before the world of Luna Republik shows an other side: the war and the omnipresent fear. Not many words are necessary to express the horror, but instead there is a change again... maybe there is something positive left?
A secluded melody draws a different image of this world, even though the apparent idyll in the middle of chaos does not survive long before being overtaken by suffering and the piece slowly vanishing into silence...

title: Starlit Skies
description:
So, I've officially decided that I'm going to stick to my artistic trancey style used with this song. They always seem to come out so much better than my electronic-rock songs do; or maybe I just like making these more =P. The point is that I'm dropping ANY Electronic project I had in the workings including my next album, Pride and Flame and the CMC EP, although I may make some trance-like song for the 3 of them for that one instead.

Now then, this track I went to capture an image of aomeone gazing up at a starry sky with wonder and awe,and in the end this song came out simply beautifully ^^. Most likely, I'll start working on a Trance style album now, so look forward to more songs like this from now on, Trance songs are just so artistic and beautiful as well as a joy to make, no other style I've done makes me feel quite as proud of it as this song does, so I hope you all enjoy!

title: awesome as i want to be(dusty crap remix)
Immortals
description:
Hey! Been on a semi-hiatus for the past month due to school and life. Anyways, here's a new modern piece. 

Its inspired by and contains the same rhythmic motive as the beginning of Glassworks by Phillip Glass to give a constant moving feeling, like you are moving through time. The whole piece is about Celestia and how she sees the world and time rush past her due to her immortality.

title: Snowdrop's Chorale
description:
So, I've been pretty busy with moving and haven't been able to work on my music much. 
I've got some pieces in the making and because its been 3 weeks since my last upload, i've decided to upload this old piece thats been sitting on my disk for a while. Its pretty old. I think I wrote it either January or February this year. It's from when I used to write with a more baroque style. 
The Chorale in the middle is a re-orchestrated version of "Wer hat dich so geschlagen" by J.S. Bach.

Cover Art: http://xlovelydeathx.deviantart.com/art/Snowdrop-Wallpaper-361626390

title: Tu presencia
description:
English and Spanish video description, viva~

[ENGLISH]

As it's said in the title, this track is going to be part of the Brohoofest 2015 Official Soundtrack. 

And what the hay is a Brohoofest? Well, it's the name of the southamerican brony convention that will be held in Perú on February 21. If you want to know more about it, please check the link below :3

http://brohoofest.bropegworld.com/

Now, about the song: you probably noticed that I tried to put as many as regional instruments and sounds that I could on this one to honor my southamerican culture.
The lyrics are inspired by that pretty pony you see in the cover art: Sari, brohoofest's official mascot. She has a very interesting story (wich hopefully you'll read in some comics once the convention starts) about unity, love, and all that pony stuff :3

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you like the song and want to support me, please consider downloading it at bandcamp :)

https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/tu-presencia
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[SPANISH]

Como está escrito en el título, este track va a formar parte del Sountrack Oficial de la Brohoofest 2015.

Y qué es una brohoofest? Bueno, es el nombre de la convención brony sudamericana a realizarse en Perú a partir del 21 de febrero. Si querés saber más sobre el asunto, date una vuelta por este link :3

http://brohoofest.bropegworld.com/

Ahora sobre la canción: probablemente hayan notado que quise poner la mayor cantidad de instrumentos y sonidos autóctonos posibles, para honrar mi condición de sudamericano también.
La letra está inspirada en esa ponita que se ve en la imagen del video. Su nombre es Sari y será la mascota oficial de la convención. Tiene una linda historia que seguramente van a poder leer en algunos cómics llegada la fecha de apertura del evento.

Una cosa más, si te gustó la canción y quieres ayudarme a continuar con mi trabajo, considera bajarla desde Bandcamp :3

https://tenderflutter.bandcamp.com/track/tu-presencia

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[LETRA EN ESPAÑOL / SPANISH LYRICS]

Soy parte de un todo y un signo de paz 
unión de ríos que llevan al mar 
llevo en mi canto la fuerza vital 
pueblos del sol de leyenda ancestral 

Ves lo que la unión ayudó a construir 
día en que todos estamos aquí 
son los cimientos de otra realidad 
dos mundos sí pueden vivir en paz 

Siento tu voz en el valle 
y tu presencia en el aire 
siento tu voz en el valle... 

Es el nacimiento de nuestra amistad 
brillan los cielos y ruge el mar 
el sol y la luna testigos serán 
en armonía y en libertad 

Siento tu voz en el valle 
y tu presencia en el aire 
Siento tu voz en el valle...

That's all, my dear pony friends. Take care!

Tender~

title: Let Yourself Shine
description:
This is my first song ever published on the internet. It's a song about being yourself and not letting anybody get in the way of who you wanna be. Hope many of you find it inspiring.

Lyrics:

Verse
Rise up from the shadows
Stop your hiding now
Don't be afriad of the world 
Live your life as yourself
instead of what others may want you to be
Fuck their opinions and their judging faces
It doesn't matter to you
Let yourself shine

Chorus
Let yourself shine
Be the one on top of the world
Don't let anything stand in your way (Stand in your way)
Be proud of who you are
Don't be a people pleaser
Become one of a kind
Find out who you are!

Verse
Damnation is this world
Bullies are everywhere
An obstacle to happiness
Don't let them stand in your way 
You can fight them
All you need to do is to walk away 
They are stupid
They're not worth listening to

Breakdown
Become one of a kind

title: One and the Same
description:
Doc's passion for science in Slice of Life really resonated with me, and I liked how it was cast as an alternate philosophy from magic. I always felt that the approach of magic in Equestria was a kind of brute force, make the cosmos do your bidding, thing, and science is more about understanding what happens when you don't try to impose your will on the environment. 

But, as Arthur C. Clark said, any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic, and as Agatha Heterodyne said, any sufficiently analyzed magic is indistinguishable from science. Really, this is at the core of my own headcanon regarding the relationship between magic and science in Equestria. 

I also liked that, for all of the references to Doctor Who, Doc is adamantly not just The Doctor in this story. He's his own character with his own background and motivations. He just happens to have a very Doctor-like eccentricity to him. 

Fun fact: That lead at the end was inspired when I leaned back in my char while working on this tune, and the piece of junk sqeaked really loudly, and I was like, "I don't remember making that synth!" But it sounded cool, so I put it in.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Purchase this tune: https://jexpsytrance.bandcamp.com/track/one-and-the-same

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Artwork by Muketti: muketti.deviantart.com/art/I-am-the-sand-in-the-bottom-half-of-the-hourglass-524905181 

Sources Sampled: 
MLP FiM S5E9: Slice of Life 
Thor 

Big thanks to mlptf2mods, as always, for always being bros and bringing that swag voice only audio.
